title: Vasu hands over official residence and vehicles
body_lines: Minister of Water Supply Vasudeva Nanayakkara handed over his official residence and vehicles to the Ministry Secretary today, Sources said.
The Minister earlier boycotted ministerial duties in protest over the removal of MPs Wimal Weerawansa and Udaya Gammanpila.
However, he has insisted that he would not resign from the ministerial portfolio. (Kelum Bandara)
